contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 23, 1958 D Edinburgh International Contest
Edinburgh International Contest 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
edinburgh-international-contest
Princes Street Gardens, Edinburgh March contest - 1st Carlton Main, 2nd Scottish CWS, 3rd Tullis Russell Mills. Hymn tune contest - 1st Brighouse and Rastrick, 2nd Tullis Russell Mills. Deportment - 1st Brighouse and Rastrick, 2nd Tullis Russell Mills. 10th annual contest. 10 bands competed.
Feb. 6, 2011, 8:13 p.m. April 14, 2014, 12:40 p.m.
1 Cooperation Band W. C. Crozier Life Divine
2 Carlton Main Frickley Colliery Band Jack Atherton The Frogs of Aristophanes
3 Tullis Russell Mills Drake Rimmer Carmen
4 Brighouse and Rastrick Band Trevor Walmsley Tchaikovsky [arr. W. Rimmer]
5 Yorkshire Imperial Brass Band Bernard Burns Comedy Overture
6 Wingates Band Hugh Parry Resurgam
Unknown Result Agnes Street Band Ernest Ruddock Resurgam
Unknown Result Clydebank Burgh Band John Kirkwood Tournament for Brass
Unknown Result Crookhall Colliery J. J. Stobbs Tchaikovsky [arr. W. Rimmer]
Unknown Result Newmains R. S. Dow Tchaikovsky [arr. W. Rimmer]
